group_1.textRight: It's okay, you don't have to lie to me.
So, what were you up to...?

group_1.textLeft: I really was just thinking of singing to the wind.

group_1.textRight: There's been some strange things about you, like@the last time you didn't come back from@Takarazaki.

group_1.textLeft: Gh...

group_1.textRight: If you keep sneaking off like this you know we@can't keep trusting you?

group_1.textLeft: Um...

group_1.textRight: If Sasha's keeping a secret, it'd be a real relief to@know what it is.
If you're in another group, or a spy, this cutie@won't mind.
You won't be kicked out or killed, and this cutie'll@keep your secret safe.

group_1.textLeft: Why...

group_1.textRight: If you're asking that, then there really is@something.[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102801:motion_100][chara:102801:lipSynch_1] Kyaha★
You don't have to be so tense.
Sasha, you're the person that saved this cutie's@suffering heart.
The ideology of Magical Girl supremacy is the@biggest and bestest thing you've given me.
They can't betray me. They're my membs.

group_1.textCenter: Why won't anyone accept us cuties...
Even before you became a part of this cutie, people@were saying I was off...
No one understands that you're inside of this@cutie...
They think this cutie's lost her mind or@something. It's so, so puzzling...
I'm sorry, Hiko... This cutie can't do anything...
I'd have to do something incredible to turn@the world upside down.
There's no way our love can ever come true...
There has so be somewhere we can be free...

group_1.textRight: Um...

group_1.narration: ―Alexandra―@If it's okay, would you like to use this grief seed?
―Alexandra―@Even though you're in Kamihama,@you never know what will happen, do you?

group_1.textRight: Then why don't you come join us in Neo Magius?

group_1.textLeft: Neo Magius...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I also once had a love that wouldn't be, though@I'm the type to give up on it.
So♪
[chara:103501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Join me in creating a world where we can be@free to love.
The idea that Magical Girls are the supreme rulers@is the foundation of our goals♪
Uhuhu♪
Up until that point, this cutie thought she was@going to die,
So she's not going to do anything mean to Sasha.

group_1.textLeft: Even though I used you to get into Neo Magius...?
That I took advantage of your suffering just to@join...?

group_1.textRight: Ain't that obvious★

group_1.textLeft: ...Then would you let me stay in Neo Magius?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we won't tell anyone.

group_1.textLeft: Then please believe me. We won't do anything.
But, I do some work as a member in that group,
though we only watch the course of the battles.

group_1.textRight: Is that seriously it? You really only just watch?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, because that is the only thing we can do@right now.

group_1.textRight: Man, and here we thought this would be a hella@crazy story.

group_1.textLeft: Did I disappoint you?

group_1.textRight: Ain't that obvious.
We thought you'd have Neo Magius destroyed,
our ideas for how to manage Magical Girls,
our plans to let the world know about how superior@Magical Girls are.
We were totally prepared to watch it all go up@in smoke.

group_1.textLeft: ...Then, may I just tell you one thing?

group_1.textRight: What? Something real crazy dark?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
Even if you manage to carry out your goals, I believe@you will [textRed:die], Hime.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]――Hh!?
How could you say that?

group_1.textLeft: It's... like a kind of fortune-telling that's almost@always accurate...

group_1.textRight: Well then, this cutie just has to do her best to@not let it come true.
By the way, could we ask something? Who are you@really, Sasha?
What is this group you're in?

group_1.textLeft: [textRed:Folklore of Zero]... Kurusu Alexandra.
